our advantages

Our employees are always ready to share their experience, as they themselves run half marathons, have swum the Bosphorus, and are preparing for triathlon competitions!

Polar FT1 Heart Monitor
For the first steps in heart rate-based workouts
details
  • You will hear a sound notification about the desired pulse during the workout;
  • You will see an informative graphical indicator of the target training zones of the pulse;
  • You will also see information about the calorie consumption per workout;
  • You will be able to view data on 10 workouts.

Customer reviews

Iryna Ivanchenko
2 half marathons
I didn't know what to buy for myself - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked up a heart rate monitor that fit exactly my goals and financial capabilities. After a while, I decided to update the gadget - without hesitation, I turned to the same place.

New goals - a new gadget!

Thanks, RunSmart!
Ivan Simochkin
1 half marathons
A cool thing is a heart rate monitor. I usually ran without them. It turns out that he only made it worse for himself.
I bought a heart rate monitor, and received a workout as a gift. They conducted the first training session with me, taught me how to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, made a training plan for the month ahead.

I prepared for my first half marathon with them! Thanks!!!
Yulia Dashkina
2 half marathons
I couldn't start running for a long time, because I had started several times before, but it got hard and I quit. I heard from friends about RunSmart and about running with pulse control and decided to try it.

I called, the guys asked about my goals and picked up a very interesting option with a discount! Now I'm running and enjoying running! I have already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races and I do not intend to stop!

Thanks!!!
